Package ex2

Class ManageVoteServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • ex2.ManageVoteServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet(name="ManageVoteServlet",
            urlPatterns="/manageVoteServlet")
public class ManageVoteServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The ManageVoteServlet is load the answers and present for each question the number of vote it will store the information in html and send it to the client That servlet also increase number of vote, each client can vote only once and validation of client to vote will be checked by session do post request add vote to specific answer that specific do get request show the poll vot result functional 1. create the poll as answers and send to the client 2. increase the vote number if needed (will valid if need by use session)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      create the poll answers and vote and send it to the client
      protected void doGet​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      get request that show the answers if user already vote we dont need to increase the votes so we only show the poll
      protected void doPost​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      post request get the number of answer the client choose valid if its the first vote of the user and increase the answer vote if require
      void handlePoll​(@NotNull javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      check if the submit button are not null then continue to the poll if its null show the client msg to choose one of the poll question

      Initial the poll from the context it will happened one time

      • sessionChacker

        private boolean sessionChacker​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        check if the user already vote by session. True = new client add is vote false = client already exist dont increase vote number
        Parameters:
        request - - for get the session
        Returns:
        True if its new client False if the client already exist
